title: Is God of War’s TV Show Saved? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.23.24
description:
New World: Aeternum is OUT NOW on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Phasmophobia releases on PS5, PS VR2, and Xbox Series X|S on October 29. Wishlist now!
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005673
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/phasmophobia-game-preview/9N6D60SBZN05/0010

Download the Marvel Snap app now available on the App Store, Google Play and Steam, or visit http://www.marvelsnap.com to learn more.

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades. 

God of War on Amazon gets a new showrunner, Prince of Persia’s devs get moved to some surprising new projects, and The Day Before devs cancel their kickstarter and announce another new game.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - is “How to interview”
 - After that is a reaction to the Fallout Day 2024 stream
 - The STREAM is Alan Wake 2 The Lake House
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway

00:02:30 - Housekeeping

00:05:53 - God of War’ Amazon TV Series Enlists Ronald D. Moore as New Showrunner
00:13:32 - Prince of Persia Devs Move to Three New Projects at Ubisoft 
00:26:31 - The Day Before Dev Cancels Failing Kickstarter and Announces Another Game in the Same Breath
00:31:00 - Xbox Series X Is Finally Outselling the Series S
00:41:42 - Wee News!
00:45:52 - You‘re Wrong & SuperChats
